title: The Real Life Spies from Netflix's "THE SPY"
author: Think Story
comment: Great, the comments will be filled with Borat quotes.
This was one of the best things I've seen on Netflix. It had me on the edge of my seat. I hope Sacha Cohen does more serious work like this.

Love it and sacha was exceptional.
It gaves me anxiety before he was caught.
Those trees planted on Golan heights , that helped in 6 day war.epic
Sacha was brillant in the series, you won't see any traces of Bruno or Aladeen. He's as serious as cancer in this one and the final epidsode made my palms really sweaty.
description:
In this video we take a look at Netflix's latest spy drama "The Spy" based on the life of Eli Cohen portrayed by Sacha Baron Cohen and the real life characters of which it is based.
